metrics.visualTitle: Sum of Amount
Sum of Amount by B2B

metrics.QueryText:
DEFINE
	VAR __DS0Core = 
		SUMMARIZECOLUMNS(
			'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B],
			"SumAmount", CALCULATE(SUM('Amazon Sale Report'[Amount]))
		)

	VAR __DS0PrimaryWindowed = 
		TOPN(1001, __DS0Core, [SumAmount], 0, 'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B], 1)

EVALUATE
	__DS0PrimaryWindowed

ORDER BY
	[SumAmount] DESC, 'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B]

metrics.visualTitle: Sum of Amount by B2B and Category

metrics.QueryText:
DEFINE
	VAR __DS0Core = 
		SUMMARIZECOLUMNS(
			'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B],
			ROLLUPADDISSUBTOTAL('Amazon Sale Report'[Category], "IsGrandTotalColumnTotal"),
			"SumAmount", CALCULATE(SUM('Amazon Sale Report'[Amount]))
		)

	VAR __DS0CoreOnlyOutputTotals = 
		SELECTCOLUMNS(
			KEEPFILTERS(FILTER(KEEPFILTERS(__DS0Core), [IsGrandTotalColumnTotal] = FALSE)),
			"'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B]", 'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B],
			"'Amazon Sale Report'[Category]", 'Amazon Sale Report'[Category],
			"SumAmount", [SumAmount]
		)

	VAR __DS0CoreTableByDM0 = 
		SELECTCOLUMNS(
			KEEPFILTERS(FILTER(KEEPFILTERS(__DS0Core), [IsGrandTotalColumnTotal] = TRUE)),
			"'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B]", 'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B],
			"SortBy_DM0_0", [SumAmount]
		)

	VAR __DS0PrimaryWithSortColumns = 
		NATURALLEFTOUTERJOIN(
			SUMMARIZE(__DS0Core, 'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B]),
			__DS0CoreTableByDM0
		)

	VAR __DS0PrimaryWindowed = 
		TOPN(201, __DS0PrimaryWithSortColumns, [SortBy_DM0_0], 0, 'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B], 1)

	VAR __DS0SecondaryBase = 
		SUMMARIZE(__DS0CoreOnlyOutputTotals, 'Amazon Sale Report'[Category])

	VAR __DS0Secondary = 
		TOPN(62, __DS0SecondaryBase, 'Amazon Sale Report'[Category], 1)

	VAR __DS0BodyLimited = 
		NATURALLEFTOUTERJOIN(
			__DS0PrimaryWindowed,
			SUBSTITUTEWITHINDEX(
				__DS0CoreOnlyOutputTotals,
				"ColumnIndex",
				__DS0Secondary,
				'Amazon Sale Report'[Category],
				ASC
			)
		)

EVALUATE
	__DS0Secondary

ORDER BY
	'Amazon Sale Report'[Category]

EVALUATE
	__DS0BodyLimited

ORDER BY
	[SortBy_DM0_0] DESC, 'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B], [ColumnIndex]

metrics.visualTitle: Sum of Amount by B2B, Category and Courier Status

metrics.QueryText:
DEFINE
	VAR __DS0Core = 
		SUMMARIZECOLUMNS(
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Courier Status],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Category],
			"SumAmount", CALCULATE(SUM('Amazon Sale Report'[Amount]))
		)

	VAR __DS0PrimaryBase = 
		SUMMARIZE(__DS0Core, 'Amazon Sale Report'[Courier Status], 'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B])

	VAR __DS0SecondaryBase = 
		SUMMARIZE(__DS0Core, 'Amazon Sale Report'[Category])

	VAR __DS0ScopedPreLimitL1 = 
		SUMMARIZE(__DS0PrimaryBase, 'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B])

	VAR __DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count = CALCULATE(COUNTROWS(__DS0ScopedPreLimitL1))

	VAR __DS0ScopedPreLimitL0 = 
		SUMMARIZE(__DS0PrimaryBase, 'Amazon Sale Report'[Courier Status])

	VAR __DS0ScopedPreLimitL0Count = CALCULATE(COUNTROWS(__DS0ScopedPreLimitL0))

	VAR __DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count = CALCULATE(COUNTROWS(__DS0SecondaryBase))

	VAR __DS0LimitBlock0DbCount = MIN(__DS0ScopedPreLimitL0Count, 6)

	VAR __DS0LimitBlock1DbCount = 
		(__DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count * __DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count)

	VAR __DS0RemainingCapacityAtStart = DIVIDE(30000, __DS0LimitBlock0DbCount)

	VAR __DS0LimitBlock1Count = 
		CEILING(
			MAX(MIN(MIN(__DS0RemainingCapacityAtStart, 3500), __DS0LimitBlock1DbCount), 1),
			1
		)

	VAR __DS0InitTargetPrimaryCount = 
		IF(
			__DS0LimitBlock1DbCount <= __DS0LimitBlock1Count,
			__DS0LimitBlock1Count,
			IF(
				AND(__DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count > 1000, __DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count > 60),
				CEILING(DIVIDE(__DS0LimitBlock1Count, 60), 1),
				IF(
					__DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count > 60,
					__DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count,
					CEILING(DIVIDE(__DS0LimitBlock1Count, __DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count), 1)
				)
			)
		)

	VAR __DS0InitTargetSecondaryCount = 
		IF(
			__DS0LimitBlock1DbCount <= __DS0LimitBlock1Count,
			__DS0LimitBlock1Count,
			IF(
				AND(__DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count > 1000, __DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count > 60),
				60,
				IF(
					__DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count > 60,
					CEILING(DIVIDE(__DS0LimitBlock1Count, __DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count), 1),
					__DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count
				)
			)
		)

	VAR __DS0MinPrimaryCount = MIN(10, __DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count)

	VAR __DS0MinSecondaryCount = MIN(10, __DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count)

	VAR __DS0TargetPrimaryCount = 
		IF(
			__DS0InitTargetPrimaryCount < __DS0MinPrimaryCount,
			__DS0MinPrimaryCount,
			IF(
				__DS0InitTargetSecondaryCount < __DS0MinSecondaryCount,
				CEILING(DIVIDE(__DS0LimitBlock1Count, __DS0MinSecondaryCount), 1),
				__DS0InitTargetPrimaryCount
			)
		)

	VAR __DS0TargetSecondaryCount = 
		IF(
			__DS0InitTargetPrimaryCount < __DS0MinPrimaryCount,
			CEILING(DIVIDE(__DS0LimitBlock1Count, __DS0MinPrimaryCount), 1),
			IF(
				__DS0InitTargetSecondaryCount < __DS0MinSecondaryCount,
				__DS0MinSecondaryCount,
				__DS0InitTargetSecondaryCount
			)
		)

	VAR __DS0ScopedLimitL0 = 
		TOPN(6, __DS0ScopedPreLimitL0, 'Amazon Sale Report'[Courier Status], 1)

	VAR __DS0ScopedLimitL1 = 
		TOPN(__DS0TargetPrimaryCount, __DS0ScopedPreLimitL1, 'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B], 1)

	VAR __SyncDS0SyncTable = 
		SUBSTITUTEWITHINDEX(
			ADDCOLUMNS(
				KEEPFILTERS(__DS0ScopedLimitL1),
				"ClonedB2B", 'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B]
			),
			"SyncI0",
			SELECTCOLUMNS(
				KEEPFILTERS(__DS0ScopedLimitL1),
				"ClonedB2B", 'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B]
			),
			[ClonedB2B],
			ASC
		)

	VAR __DS0BodyRegroupedToDM1ScopedLimitedL1 = 
		NATURALLEFTOUTERJOIN(
			__SyncDS0SyncTable,
			__DS0PrimaryBase
		)

	VAR __IsDM1Valid = 
		CALCULATE(NOT(ISEMPTY(__DS0BodyRegroupedToDM1ScopedLimitedL1)))

	VAR __DS0PrimaryLimited = 
		NATURALLEFTOUTERJOIN(
			__DS0ScopedLimitL0,
			ADDCOLUMNS(
				KEEPFILTERS(__DS0BodyRegroupedToDM1ScopedLimitedL1),
				"IsDM1Valid", __IsDM1Valid
			)
		)

	VAR __DS0ScopedLimitL2 = 
		TOPN(__DS0TargetSecondaryCount, __DS0SecondaryBase, 'Amazon Sale Report'[Category], 1)

	VAR __DS0BodyLimited = 
		NATURALLEFTOUTERJOIN(
			__DS0PrimaryLimited,
			SUBSTITUTEWITHINDEX(
				__DS0Core,
				"ColumnIndex",
				__DS0ScopedLimitL2,
				'Amazon Sale Report'[Category],
				ASC
			)
		)

EVALUATE
	ROW(
		"DS0ScopedPreLimitL0Count", __DS0ScopedPreLimitL0Count,
		"DS0ScopedLimitL0Count", 6,
		"DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count", __DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count,
		"DS0ScopedLimitL1Count", __DS0TargetPrimaryCount,
		"DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count", __DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count,
		"DS0ScopedLimitL2Count", __DS0TargetSecondaryCount
	)

EVALUATE
	__DS0ScopedLimitL1

ORDER BY
	'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B]

EVALUATE
	GROUPBY(
		__DS0Core,
		"MinSumAmount", MINX(CURRENTGROUP(), [SumAmount]),
		"MaxSumAmount", MAXX(CURRENTGROUP(), [SumAmount])
	)

EVALUATE
	__DS0ScopedLimitL2

ORDER BY
	'Amazon Sale Report'[Category]

EVALUATE
	__DS0BodyLimited

ORDER BY
	'Amazon Sale Report'[Courier Status], 'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B], [ColumnIndex]

metrics.visualTitle: Sum of Amount by B2B, currency, Category and Courier Status

DEFINE
	VAR __DS0Core = 
		SUMMARIZECOLUMNS(
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Courier Status],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[currency],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Category],
			"SumAmount", CALCULATE(SUM('Amazon Sale Report'[Amount]))
		)

	VAR __DS0PrimaryBase = 
		SUMMARIZE(
			__DS0Core,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Courier Status],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[currency]
		)

	VAR __DS0SecondaryBase = 
		SUMMARIZE(__DS0Core, 'Amazon Sale Report'[Category])

	VAR __DS0ScopedPreLimitL1 = 
		SUMMARIZE(__DS0PrimaryBase, 'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B], 'Amazon Sale Report'[currency])

	VAR __DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count = CALCULATE(COUNTROWS(__DS0ScopedPreLimitL1))

	VAR __DS0ScopedPreLimitL0 = 
		SUMMARIZE(__DS0PrimaryBase, 'Amazon Sale Report'[Courier Status])

	VAR __DS0ScopedPreLimitL0Count = CALCULATE(COUNTROWS(__DS0ScopedPreLimitL0))

	VAR __DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count = CALCULATE(COUNTROWS(__DS0SecondaryBase))

	VAR __DS0LimitBlock0DbCount = MIN(__DS0ScopedPreLimitL0Count, 6)

	VAR __DS0LimitBlock1DbCount = 
		(__DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count * __DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count)

	VAR __DS0RemainingCapacityAtStart = DIVIDE(30000, __DS0LimitBlock0DbCount)

	VAR __DS0LimitBlock1Count = 
		CEILING(
			MAX(MIN(MIN(__DS0RemainingCapacityAtStart, 3500), __DS0LimitBlock1DbCount), 1),
			1
		)

	VAR __DS0InitTargetPrimaryCount = 
		IF(
			__DS0LimitBlock1DbCount <= __DS0LimitBlock1Count,
			__DS0LimitBlock1Count,
			IF(
				AND(__DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count > 1000, __DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count > 60),
				CEILING(DIVIDE(__DS0LimitBlock1Count, 60), 1),
				IF(
					__DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count > 60,
					__DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count,
					CEILING(DIVIDE(__DS0LimitBlock1Count, __DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count), 1)
				)
			)
		)

	VAR __DS0InitTargetSecondaryCount = 
		IF(
			__DS0LimitBlock1DbCount <= __DS0LimitBlock1Count,
			__DS0LimitBlock1Count,
			IF(
				AND(__DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count > 1000, __DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count > 60),
				60,
				IF(
					__DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count > 60,
					CEILING(DIVIDE(__DS0LimitBlock1Count, __DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count), 1),
					__DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count
				)
			)
		)

	VAR __DS0MinPrimaryCount = MIN(10, __DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count)

	VAR __DS0MinSecondaryCount = MIN(10, __DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count)

	VAR __DS0TargetPrimaryCount = 
		IF(
			__DS0InitTargetPrimaryCount < __DS0MinPrimaryCount,
			__DS0MinPrimaryCount,
			IF(
				__DS0InitTargetSecondaryCount < __DS0MinSecondaryCount,
				CEILING(DIVIDE(__DS0LimitBlock1Count, __DS0MinSecondaryCount), 1),
				__DS0InitTargetPrimaryCount
			)
		)

	VAR __DS0TargetSecondaryCount = 
		IF(
			__DS0InitTargetPrimaryCount < __DS0MinPrimaryCount,
			CEILING(DIVIDE(__DS0LimitBlock1Count, __DS0MinPrimaryCount), 1),
			IF(
				__DS0InitTargetSecondaryCount < __DS0MinSecondaryCount,
				__DS0MinSecondaryCount,
				__DS0InitTargetSecondaryCount
			)
		)

	VAR __DS0ScopedLimitL0 = 
		TOPN(6, __DS0ScopedPreLimitL0, 'Amazon Sale Report'[Courier Status], 1)

	VAR __DS0ScopedLimitL1 = 
		TOPN(
			__DS0TargetPrimaryCount,
			__DS0ScopedPreLimitL1,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B],
			1,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[currency],
			1
		)

	VAR __SyncDS0SyncTable = 
		SUBSTITUTEWITHINDEX(
			ADDCOLUMNS(
				KEEPFILTERS(__DS0ScopedLimitL1),
				"ClonedB2B", 'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B],
				"Clonedcurrency", 'Amazon Sale Report'[currency]
			),
			"SyncI0",
			SELECTCOLUMNS(
				KEEPFILTERS(__DS0ScopedLimitL1),
				"ClonedB2B", 'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B],
				"Clonedcurrency", 'Amazon Sale Report'[currency]
			),
			[ClonedB2B],
			ASC,
			[Clonedcurrency],
			ASC
		)

	VAR __DS0BodyRegroupedToDM1ScopedLimitedL1 =

			__SyncDS0SyncTable,
			__DS0PrimaryBase

	VAR __IsDM1Valid =

		NATURALLEFTOUTERJOIN(

ORDER BY
	'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B], 'Amazon Sale Report'[currency]

EVALUATE

		"MinSumAmount", MINX(CURRENTGROUP(), [SumAmount]),
		"MaxSumAmount", MAXX(CURRENTGROUP(), [SumAmount])
	)

	__DS0ScopedLimitL2

ORDER BY
	'Amazon Sale Report'[Category]

EVALUATE
	__DS0BodyLimited

ORDER BY
	'Amazon Sale Report'[Courier Status],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[currency],
	[ColumnIndex]

DEFINE

	VAR __DS0LimitBlock0DbCount = MIN(__DS0ScopedPreLimitL0Count, 6)

	VAR __DS0LimitBlock1DbCount =

	VAR __DS0InitTargetPrimaryCount =

			IF(
				AND(__DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count > 1000, __DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count > 60),

	VAR __DS0InitTargetSecondaryCount =

		)

	VAR __DS0MinPrimaryCount = MIN(10, __DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count)

metrics.visualTitle: Sum of Amount and Sum of index by B2B, currency, Date, Category and Courier Status

metrics.QueryText:
DEFINE
	VAR __DS0Core = 
		SUMMARIZECOLUMNS(

			'Amazon Sale Report'[Date],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Category],
			"SumAmount", CALCULATE(SUM('Amazon Sale Report'[Amount])),
			"Sumindex", IGNORE(CALCULATE(SUM('Amazon Sale Report'[index])))
		)

	VAR __DS0PrimaryBase = 
		SUMMARIZE(
			__DS0Core,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Courier Status],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B],

		)

	VAR __DS0ScopedPreLimitL1 = 
		SUMMARIZE(
			__DS0PrimaryBase,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[currency],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Date]
		)

	VAR __DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count = CALCULATE(COUNTROWS(__DS0ScopedPreLimitL1))

	VAR __DS0ScopedPreLimitL0 =

		CEILING(

		IF(

					__DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count > 60,
					__DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count,

	VAR __DS0InitTargetSecondaryCount =

EVALUATE

metrics.QueryText:
DEFINE
	VAR __DS0Core = 
		SUMMARIZECOLUMNS(
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Courier Status],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[currency],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Date],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Fulfilment],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Order ID],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-country],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-service-level],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-state],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Size],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Status],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Category],
			"SumAmount", CALCULATE(SUM('Amazon Sale Report'[Amount])),
			"Sumindex", IGNORE(CALCULATE(SUM('Amazon Sale Report'[index]))),
			"SumQty", IGNORE(CALCULATE(SUM('Amazon Sale Report'[Qty]))),
			"Sumship_postal_code", IGNORE(CALCULATE(SUM('Amazon Sale Report'[ship-postal-code])))
		)

	VAR __DS0PrimaryBase = 
		SUMMARIZE(
			__DS0Core,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Courier Status],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[currency],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Date],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Fulfilment],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Order ID],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-country],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-service-level],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-state],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Size],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Status]
		)

	VAR __DS0SecondaryBase = 
		SUMMARIZE(__DS0Core, 'Amazon Sale Report'[Category])

	VAR __DS0ScopedPreLimitL1 = 
		SUMMARIZE(
			__DS0PrimaryBase,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[currency],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Date],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Fulfilment],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Order ID],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-country],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-service-level],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-state],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Size],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Status]
		)

	VAR __DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count = CALCULATE(COUNTROWS(__DS0ScopedPreLimitL1))

	VAR __DS0ScopedPreLimitL0 = 
		SUMMARIZE(__DS0PrimaryBase, 'Amazon Sale Report'[Courier Status])

	VAR __DS0ScopedPreLimitL0Count = CALCULATE(COUNTROWS(__DS0ScopedPreLimitL0))

	VAR __DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count = CALCULATE(COUNTROWS(__DS0SecondaryBase))

	VAR __DS0LimitBlock0DbCount = MIN(__DS0ScopedPreLimitL0Count, 6)

	VAR __DS0LimitBlock1DbCount = 
		(__DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count * __DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count)

	VAR __DS0RemainingCapacityAtStart = DIVIDE(30000, __DS0LimitBlock0DbCount)

	VAR __DS0LimitBlock1Count = 
		CEILING(
			MAX(MIN(MIN(__DS0RemainingCapacityAtStart, 3500), __DS0LimitBlock1DbCount), 1),
			1
		)

	VAR __DS0InitTargetPrimaryCount = 
		IF(
			__DS0LimitBlock1DbCount <= __DS0LimitBlock1Count,
			__DS0LimitBlock1Count,
			IF(
				AND(__DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count > 1000, __DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count > 60),
				CEILING(DIVIDE(__DS0LimitBlock1Count, 60), 1),
				IF(
					__DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count > 60,
					__DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count,
					CEILING(DIVIDE(__DS0LimitBlock1Count, __DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count), 1)
				)
			)
		)

	VAR __DS0InitTargetSecondaryCount = 
		IF(
			__DS0LimitBlock1DbCount <= __DS0LimitBlock1Count,
			__DS0LimitBlock1Count,
			IF(
				AND(__DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count > 1000, __DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count > 60),
				60,
				IF(
					__DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count > 60,
					CEILING(DIVIDE(__DS0LimitBlock1Count, __DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count), 1),
					__DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count
				)
			)
		)

	VAR __DS0MinPrimaryCount = MIN(10, __DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count)

	VAR __DS0MinSecondaryCount = MIN(10, __DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count)

	VAR __DS0TargetPrimaryCount = 
		IF(
			__DS0InitTargetPrimaryCount < __DS0MinPrimaryCount,
			__DS0MinPrimaryCount,
			IF(
				__DS0InitTargetSecondaryCount < __DS0MinSecondaryCount,
				CEILING(DIVIDE(__DS0LimitBlock1Count, __DS0MinSecondaryCount), 1),
				__DS0InitTargetPrimaryCount
			)
		)

	VAR __DS0TargetSecondaryCount = 
		IF(
			__DS0InitTargetPrimaryCount < __DS0MinPrimaryCount,
			CEILING(DIVIDE(__DS0LimitBlock1Count, __DS0MinPrimaryCount), 1),
			IF(
				__DS0InitTargetSecondaryCount < __DS0MinSecondaryCount,
				__DS0MinSecondaryCount,
				__DS0InitTargetSecondaryCount
			)
		)

	VAR __DS0ScopedLimitL0 = 
		TOPN(6, __DS0ScopedPreLimitL0, 'Amazon Sale Report'[Courier Status], 1)

	VAR __DS0ScopedLimitL1 = 
		TOPN(
			__DS0TargetPrimaryCount,
			__DS0ScopedPreLimitL1,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B],
			1,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[currency],
			1,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Date],
			1,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Fulfilment],
			1,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Order ID],
			1,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-country],
			1,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-service-level],
			1,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-state],
			1,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Size],
			1,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Status],
			1
		)

	VAR __SyncDS0SyncTable = 
		SUBSTITUTEWITHINDEX(
			ADDCOLUMNS(
				KEEPFILTERS(__DS0ScopedLimitL1),
				"ClonedB2B", 'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B],
				"Clonedcurrency", 'Amazon Sale Report'[currency],
				"ClonedDate", 'Amazon Sale Report'[Date],
				"ClonedFulfilment", 'Amazon Sale Report'[Fulfilment],
				"ClonedOrder_ID", 'Amazon Sale Report'[Order ID],
				"Clonedship_country", 'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-country],
				"Clonedship_service_level", 'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-service-level],
				"Clonedship_state", 'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-state],
				"ClonedSize", 'Amazon Sale Report'[Size],
				"ClonedStatus", 'Amazon Sale Report'[Status]
			),
			"SyncI0",
			SELECTCOLUMNS(
				KEEPFILTERS(__DS0ScopedLimitL1),
				"ClonedB2B", 'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B],
				"Clonedcurrency", 'Amazon Sale Report'[currency],
				"ClonedDate", 'Amazon Sale Report'[Date],
				"ClonedFulfilment", 'Amazon Sale Report'[Fulfilment],
				"ClonedOrder_ID", 'Amazon Sale Report'[Order ID],
				"Clonedship_country", 'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-country],
				"Clonedship_service_level", 'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-service-level],
				"Clonedship_state", 'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-state],
				"ClonedSize", 'Amazon Sale Report'[Size],
				"ClonedStatus", 'Amazon Sale Report'[Status]
			),
			[ClonedB2B],
			ASC,
			[Clonedcurrency],
			ASC,
			[ClonedDate],
			ASC,
			[ClonedFulfilment],
			ASC,
			[ClonedOrder_ID],
			ASC,
			[Clonedship_country],
			ASC,
			[Clonedship_service_level],
			ASC,
			[Clonedship_state],
			ASC,
			[ClonedSize],
			ASC,
			[ClonedStatus],
			ASC
		)

	VAR __DS0BodyRegroupedToDM1ScopedLimitedL1 = 
		NATURALLEFTOUTERJOIN(
			__SyncDS0SyncTable,
			__DS0PrimaryBase
		)

	VAR __IsDM1Valid = 
		CALCULATE(NOT(ISEMPTY(__DS0BodyRegroupedToDM1ScopedLimitedL1)))

	VAR __DS0PrimaryLimited = 
		NATURALLEFTOUTERJOIN(
			__DS0ScopedLimitL0,
			ADDCOLUMNS(
				KEEPFILTERS(__DS0BodyRegroupedToDM1ScopedLimitedL1),
				"IsDM1Valid", __IsDM1Valid
			)
		)

	VAR __DS0ScopedLimitL2 = 
		TOPN(__DS0TargetSecondaryCount, __DS0SecondaryBase, 'Amazon Sale Report'[Category], 1)

	VAR __DS0BodyLimited = 
		NATURALLEFTOUTERJOIN(
			__DS0PrimaryLimited,
			SUBSTITUTEWITHINDEX(
				__DS0Core,
				"ColumnIndex",
				__DS0ScopedLimitL2,
				'Amazon Sale Report'[Category],
				ASC
			)
		)

EVALUATE
	ROW(
		"DS0ScopedPreLimitL0Count", __DS0ScopedPreLimitL0Count,
		"DS0ScopedLimitL0Count", 6,
		"DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count", __DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count,
		"DS0ScopedLimitL1Count", __DS0TargetPrimaryCount,
		"DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count", __DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count,
		"DS0ScopedLimitL2Count", __DS0TargetSecondaryCount
	)

EVALUATE
	__DS0ScopedLimitL1

ORDER BY
	'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[currency],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[Date],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[Fulfilment],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[Order ID],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-country],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-service-level],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-state],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[Size],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[Status]

EVALUATE
	GROUPBY(
		__DS0Core,
		"MinSumAmount", MINX(CURRENTGROUP(), [SumAmount]),
		"MaxSumAmount", MAXX(CURRENTGROUP(), [SumAmount])
	)

EVALUATE
	__DS0ScopedLimitL2

ORDER BY
	'Amazon Sale Report'[Category]

	__DS0BodyLimited

	VAR __DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count = CALCULATE(COUNTROWS(__DS0ScopedPreLimitL1))

	VAR __DS0ScopedPreLimitL0 = 
		SUMMARIZE(__DS0PrimaryBase, 'Amazon Sale Report'[Courier Status])

	VAR __DS0ScopedPreLimitL0Count = CALCULATE(COUNTROWS(__DS0ScopedPreLimitL0))

	VAR __DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count = CALCULATE(COUNTROWS(__DS0SecondaryBase))

	VAR __DS0LimitBlock0DbCount = MIN(__DS0ScopedPreLimitL0Count, 6)

	VAR __DS0LimitBlock1DbCount = 
		(__DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count * __DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count)

	VAR __DS0RemainingCapacityAtStart = DIVIDE(30000, __DS0LimitBlock0DbCount)

	VAR __DS0LimitBlock1Count = 
		CEILING(
			MAX(MIN(MIN(__DS0RemainingCapacityAtStart, 3500), __DS0LimitBlock1DbCount), 1),
			1
		)

	VAR __DS0InitTargetPrimaryCount = 
		IF(
			__DS0LimitBlock1DbCount <= __DS0LimitBlock1Count,
			__DS0LimitBlock1Count,
			IF(
				AND(__DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count > 1000, __DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count > 60),
				CEILING(DIVIDE(__DS0LimitBlock1Count, 60), 1),
				IF(
					__DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count > 60,
					__DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count,
					CEILING(DIVIDE(__DS0LimitBlock1Count, __DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count), 1)
				)
			)
		)

	VAR __DS0InitTargetSecondaryCount = 
		IF(
			__DS0LimitBlock1DbCount <= __DS0LimitBlock1Count,
			__DS0LimitBlock1Count,
			IF(
				AND(__DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count > 1000, __DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count > 60),
				60,
				IF(
					__DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count > 60,
					CEILING(DIVIDE(__DS0LimitBlock1Count, __DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count), 1),
					__DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count
				)
			)
		)

	VAR __DS0MinPrimaryCount = MIN(10, __DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count)

	VAR __DS0MinSecondaryCount = MIN(10, __DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count)

	VAR __DS0TargetPrimaryCount = 
		IF(
			__DS0InitTargetPrimaryCount < __DS0MinPrimaryCount,
			__DS0MinPrimaryCount,
			IF(
				__DS0InitTargetSecondaryCount < __DS0MinSecondaryCount,
				CEILING(DIVIDE(__DS0LimitBlock1Count, __DS0MinSecondaryCount), 1),
				__DS0InitTargetPrimaryCount
			)
		)

	VAR __DS0TargetSecondaryCount = 
		IF(
			__DS0InitTargetPrimaryCount < __DS0MinPrimaryCount,
			CEILING(DIVIDE(__DS0LimitBlock1Count, __DS0MinPrimaryCount), 1),
			IF(
				__DS0InitTargetSecondaryCount < __DS0MinSecondaryCount,
				__DS0MinSecondaryCount,
				__DS0InitTargetSecondaryCount
			)
		)

	VAR __DS0ScopedLimitL0 = 
		TOPN(6, __DS0ScopedPreLimitL0, 'Amazon Sale Report'[Courier Status], 1)

	VAR __DS0ScopedLimitL1 = 
		TOPN(
			__DS0TargetPrimaryCount,
			__DS0ScopedPreLimitL1,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B],
			1,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[currency],
			1,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Date],
			1,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Fulfilment],
			1,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-country],
			1,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-service-level],
			1,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-state],
			1,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Size],
			1,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Status],
			1
		)

	VAR __SyncDS0SyncTable = 
		SUBSTITUTEWITHINDEX(
			ADDCOLUMNS(
				KEEPFILTERS(__DS0ScopedLimitL1),
				"ClonedB2B", 'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B],
				"Clonedcurrency", 'Amazon Sale Report'[currency],
				"ClonedDate", 'Amazon Sale Report'[Date],
				"ClonedFulfilment", 'Amazon Sale Report'[Fulfilment],
				"Clonedship_country", 'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-country],
				"Clonedship_service_level", 'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-service-level],
				"Clonedship_state", 'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-state],
				"ClonedSize", 'Amazon Sale Report'[Size],
				"ClonedStatus", 'Amazon Sale Report'[Status]
			),
			"SyncI0",
			SELECTCOLUMNS(
				KEEPFILTERS(__DS0ScopedLimitL1),
				"ClonedB2B", 'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B],
				"Clonedcurrency", 'Amazon Sale Report'[currency],
				"ClonedDate", 'Amazon Sale Report'[Date],
				"ClonedFulfilment", 'Amazon Sale Report'[Fulfilment],
				"Clonedship_country", 'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-country],
				"Clonedship_service_level", 'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-service-level],
				"Clonedship_state", 'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-state],
				"ClonedSize", 'Amazon Sale Report'[Size],
				"ClonedStatus", 'Amazon Sale Report'[Status]
			),
			[ClonedB2B],
			ASC,
			[Clonedcurrency],
			ASC,
			[ClonedDate],
			ASC,
			[ClonedFulfilment],
			ASC,
			[Clonedship_country],
			ASC,
			[Clonedship_service_level],
			ASC,
			[Clonedship_state],
			ASC,
			[ClonedSize],
			ASC,
			[ClonedStatus],
			ASC
		)

	VAR __DS0BodyRegroupedToDM1ScopedLimitedL1 = 
		NATURALLEFTOUTERJOIN(
			__SyncDS0SyncTable,
			__DS0PrimaryBase
		)

	VAR __IsDM1Valid = 
		CALCULATE(NOT(ISEMPTY(__DS0BodyRegroupedToDM1ScopedLimitedL1)))

	VAR __DS0PrimaryLimited = 
		NATURALLEFTOUTERJOIN(
			__DS0ScopedLimitL0,
			ADDCOLUMNS(
				KEEPFILTERS(__DS0BodyRegroupedToDM1ScopedLimitedL1),
				"IsDM1Valid", __IsDM1Valid
			)
		)

	VAR __DS0ScopedLimitL2 = 
		TOPN(__DS0TargetSecondaryCount, __DS0SecondaryBase, 'Amazon Sale Report'[Category], 1)

	VAR __DS0BodyLimited = 
		NATURALLEFTOUTERJOIN(
			__DS0PrimaryLimited,
			SUBSTITUTEWITHINDEX(
				__DS0Core,
				"ColumnIndex",
				__DS0ScopedLimitL2,
				'Amazon Sale Report'[Category],
				ASC
			)
		)

EVALUATE
	ROW(
		"DS0ScopedPreLimitL0Count", __DS0ScopedPreLimitL0Count,
		"DS0ScopedLimitL0Count", 6,
		"DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count", __DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count,
		"DS0ScopedLimitL1Count", __DS0TargetPrimaryCount,
		"DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count", __DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count,
		"DS0ScopedLimitL2Count", __DS0TargetSecondaryCount
	)

EVALUATE
	__DS0ScopedLimitL1

ORDER BY
	'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[currency],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[Date],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[Fulfilment],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-country],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-service-level],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-state],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[Size],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[Status]

EVALUATE
	GROUPBY(
		__DS0Core,
		"MinSumAmount", MINX(CURRENTGROUP(), [SumAmount]),
		"MaxSumAmount", MAXX(CURRENTGROUP(), [SumAmount])
	)

EVALUATE
	__DS0ScopedLimitL2

ORDER BY
	'Amazon Sale Report'[Category]

EVALUATE
	__DS0BodyLimited

ORDER BY
	'Amazon Sale Report'[Courier Status],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[currency],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[Date],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[Fulfilment],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-country],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-service-level],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-state],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[Size],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[Status],
	[ColumnIndex]

metrics.QueryText:
DEFINE
	VAR __DS0Core = 
		SUMMARIZECOLUMNS(
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Courier Status],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[currency],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Date],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Fulfilment],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-country],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-service-level],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-state],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Size],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Status],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Sales Channel],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Category],
			"SumAmount", CALCULATE(SUM('Amazon Sale Report'[Amount])),
			"Sumship_postal_code", IGNORE(CALCULATE(SUM('Amazon Sale Report'[ship-postal-code])))
		)

	VAR __DS0PrimaryBase = 
		SUMMARIZE(
			__DS0Core,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Courier Status],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[currency],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Date],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Fulfilment],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-country],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-service-level],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-state],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Size],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Status],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Sales Channel]
		)

	VAR __DS0SecondaryBase = 
		SUMMARIZE(__DS0Core, 'Amazon Sale Report'[Category])

	VAR __DS0ScopedPreLimitL1 = 
		SUMMARIZE(
			__DS0PrimaryBase,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[currency],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Date],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Fulfilment],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-country],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-service-level],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-state],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Size],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Status],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Sales Channel]
		)

	VAR __DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count = CALCULATE(COUNTROWS(__DS0ScopedPreLimitL1))

	VAR __DS0ScopedPreLimitL0 = 
		SUMMARIZE(__DS0PrimaryBase, 'Amazon Sale Report'[Courier Status])

	VAR __DS0ScopedPreLimitL0Count = CALCULATE(COUNTROWS(__DS0ScopedPreLimitL0))

	VAR __DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count = CALCULATE(COUNTROWS(__DS0SecondaryBase))

	VAR __DS0LimitBlock0DbCount = MIN(__DS0ScopedPreLimitL0Count, 6)

	VAR __DS0LimitBlock1DbCount = 
		(__DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count * __DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count)

	VAR __DS0RemainingCapacityAtStart = DIVIDE(30000, __DS0LimitBlock0DbCount)

	VAR __DS0LimitBlock1Count = 
		CEILING(
			MAX(MIN(MIN(__DS0RemainingCapacityAtStart, 3500), __DS0LimitBlock1DbCount), 1),
			1
		)

	VAR __DS0InitTargetPrimaryCount = 
		IF(
			__DS0LimitBlock1DbCount <= __DS0LimitBlock1Count,
			__DS0LimitBlock1Count,
			IF(
				AND(__DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count > 1000, __DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count > 60),
				CEILING(DIVIDE(__DS0LimitBlock1Count, 60), 1),
				IF(
					__DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count > 60,
					__DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count,
					CEILING(DIVIDE(__DS0LimitBlock1Count, __DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count), 1)
				)
			)
		)

	VAR __DS0InitTargetSecondaryCount = 
		IF(
			__DS0LimitBlock1DbCount <= __DS0LimitBlock1Count,
			__DS0LimitBlock1Count,
			IF(
				AND(__DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count > 1000, __DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count > 60),
				60,
				IF(
					__DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count > 60,
					CEILING(DIVIDE(__DS0LimitBlock1Count, __DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count), 1),
					__DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count
				)
			)
		)

	VAR __DS0MinPrimaryCount = MIN(10, __DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count)

	VAR __DS0MinSecondaryCount = MIN(10, __DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count)

	VAR __DS0TargetPrimaryCount = 
		IF(
			__DS0InitTargetPrimaryCount < __DS0MinPrimaryCount,
			__DS0MinPrimaryCount,
			IF(
				__DS0InitTargetSecondaryCount < __DS0MinSecondaryCount,
				CEILING(DIVIDE(__DS0LimitBlock1Count, __DS0MinSecondaryCount), 1),
				__DS0InitTargetPrimaryCount
			)
		)

	VAR __DS0TargetSecondaryCount = 
		IF(
			__DS0InitTargetPrimaryCount < __DS0MinPrimaryCount,
			CEILING(DIVIDE(__DS0LimitBlock1Count, __DS0MinPrimaryCount), 1),
			IF(
				__DS0InitTargetSecondaryCount < __DS0MinSecondaryCount,
				__DS0MinSecondaryCount,
				__DS0InitTargetSecondaryCount
			)
		)

	VAR __DS0ScopedLimitL0 = 
		TOPN(6, __DS0ScopedPreLimitL0, 'Amazon Sale Report'[Courier Status], 1)

	VAR __DS0ScopedLimitL1 = 
		TOPN(
			__DS0TargetPrimaryCount,
			__DS0ScopedPreLimitL1,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B],
			1,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[currency],
			1,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Date],
			1,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Fulfilment],
			1,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-country],
			1,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-service-level],
			1,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-state],
			1,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Size],
			1,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Status],
			1,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Sales Channel],
			1
		)

	VAR __SyncDS0SyncTable = 
		SUBSTITUTEWITHINDEX(
			ADDCOLUMNS(
				KEEPFILTERS(__DS0ScopedLimitL1),
				"ClonedB2B", 'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B],
				"Clonedcurrency", 'Amazon Sale Report'[currency],
				"ClonedDate", 'Amazon Sale Report'[Date],
				"ClonedFulfilment", 'Amazon Sale Report'[Fulfilment],
				"Clonedship_country", 'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-country],
				"Clonedship_service_level", 'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-service-level],
				"Clonedship_state", 'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-state],
				"ClonedSize", 'Amazon Sale Report'[Size],
				"ClonedStatus", 'Amazon Sale Report'[Status],
				"ClonedSales_Channel", 'Amazon Sale Report'[Sales Channel]
			),
			"SyncI0",
			SELECTCOLUMNS(
				KEEPFILTERS(__DS0ScopedLimitL1),
				"ClonedB2B", 'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B],
				"Clonedcurrency", 'Amazon Sale Report'[currency],
				"ClonedDate", 'Amazon Sale Report'[Date],
				"ClonedFulfilment", 'Amazon Sale Report'[Fulfilment],
				"Clonedship_country", 'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-country],
				"Clonedship_service_level", 'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-service-level],
				"Clonedship_state", 'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-state],
				"ClonedSize", 'Amazon Sale Report'[Size],
				"ClonedStatus", 'Amazon Sale Report'[Status],
				"ClonedSales_Channel", 'Amazon Sale Report'[Sales Channel]
			),
			[ClonedB2B],
			ASC,
			[Clonedcurrency],
			ASC,
			[ClonedDate],
			ASC,
			[ClonedFulfilment],
			ASC,
			[Clonedship_country],
			ASC,
			[Clonedship_service_level],
			ASC,
			[Clonedship_state],
			ASC,
			[ClonedSize],
			ASC,
			[ClonedStatus],
			ASC,
			[ClonedSales_Channel],
			ASC
		)

	VAR __DS0BodyRegroupedToDM1ScopedLimitedL1 = 
		NATURALLEFTOUTERJOIN(
			__SyncDS0SyncTable,
			__DS0PrimaryBase
		)

	VAR __IsDM1Valid = 
		CALCULATE(NOT(ISEMPTY(__DS0BodyRegroupedToDM1ScopedLimitedL1)))

	VAR __DS0PrimaryLimited = 
		NATURALLEFTOUTERJOIN(
			__DS0ScopedLimitL0,
			ADDCOLUMNS(
				KEEPFILTERS(__DS0BodyRegroupedToDM1ScopedLimitedL1),
				"IsDM1Valid", __IsDM1Valid
			)
		)

	VAR __DS0ScopedLimitL2 = 
		TOPN(__DS0TargetSecondaryCount, __DS0SecondaryBase, 'Amazon Sale Report'[Category], 1)

	VAR __DS0BodyLimited = 
		NATURALLEFTOUTERJOIN(
			__DS0PrimaryLimited,
			SUBSTITUTEWITHINDEX(
				__DS0Core,
				"ColumnIndex",
				__DS0ScopedLimitL2,
				'Amazon Sale Report'[Category],
				ASC
			)
		)

EVALUATE
	ROW(
		"DS0ScopedPreLimitL0Count", __DS0ScopedPreLimitL0Count,
		"DS0ScopedLimitL0Count", 6,
		"DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count", __DS0ScopedPreLimitL1Count,
		"DS0ScopedLimitL1Count", __DS0TargetPrimaryCount,
		"DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count", __DS0ScopedPreLimitL2Count,
		"DS0ScopedLimitL2Count", __DS0TargetSecondaryCount
	)

EVALUATE
	__DS0ScopedLimitL1

ORDER BY
	'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[currency],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[Date],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[Fulfilment],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-country],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-service-level],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-state],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[Size],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[Status],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[Sales Channel]

EVALUATE
	GROUPBY(
		__DS0Core,
		"MinSumAmount", MINX(CURRENTGROUP(), [SumAmount]),
		"MaxSumAmount", MAXX(CURRENTGROUP(), [SumAmount])
	)

EVALUATE
	__DS0ScopedLimitL2

ORDER BY
	'Amazon Sale Report'[Category]

	__DS0BodyLimited

ORDER BY
	'Amazon Sale Report'[Courier Status],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[currency],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[Date],

metrics.visualTitle: Sum of Amount and Sum of ship-postal-code by B2B, currency, Date, Fulfilment, ship-country, ship-service-level, ship-state, Size, Status, Sales Channel and Category

metrics.QueryText:
DEFINE
	VAR __DS0Core = 
		SUMMARIZECOLUMNS(
			'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[currency],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Date],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Fulfilment],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-country],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-service-level],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-state],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Size],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Status],
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Sales Channel],
			ROLLUPADDISSUBTOTAL('Amazon Sale Report'[Category], "IsGrandTotalColumnTotal"),
			"SumAmount", CALCULATE(SUM('Amazon Sale Report'[Amount])),
			"Sumship_postal_code", IGNORE(CALCULATE(SUM('Amazon Sale Report'[ship-postal-code])))
		)

	VAR __DS0CoreOnlyOutputTotals = 
		SELECTCOLUMNS(
			KEEPFILTERS(FILTER(KEEPFILTERS(__DS0Core), [IsGrandTotalColumnTotal] = FALSE)),
			"'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B]", 'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B],
			"'Amazon Sale Report'[currency]", 'Amazon Sale Report'[currency],
			"'Amazon Sale Report'[Date]", 'Amazon Sale Report'[Date],
			"'Amazon Sale Report'[Fulfilment]", 'Amazon Sale Report'[Fulfilment],
			"'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-country]", 'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-country],
			"'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-service-level]", 'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-service-level],
			"'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-state]", 'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-state],
			"'Amazon Sale Report'[Size]", 'Amazon Sale Report'[Size],
			"'Amazon Sale Report'[Status]", 'Amazon Sale Report'[Status],
			"'Amazon Sale Report'[Sales Channel]", 'Amazon Sale Report'[Sales Channel],
			"'Amazon Sale Report'[Category]", 'Amazon Sale Report'[Category],
			"SumAmount", [SumAmount],
			"Sumship_postal_code", [Sumship_postal_code]
		)

	VAR __DS0CoreTableByDM0 = 
		SELECTCOLUMNS(
			KEEPFILTERS(FILTER(KEEPFILTERS(__DS0Core), [IsGrandTotalColumnTotal] = TRUE)),
			"'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B]", 'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B],
			"'Amazon Sale Report'[currency]", 'Amazon Sale Report'[currency],
			"'Amazon Sale Report'[Date]", 'Amazon Sale Report'[Date],
			"'Amazon Sale Report'[Fulfilment]", 'Amazon Sale Report'[Fulfilment],
			"'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-country]", 'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-country],
			"'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-service-level]", 'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-service-level],
			"'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-state]", 'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-state],
			"'Amazon Sale Report'[Size]", 'Amazon Sale Report'[Size],
			"'Amazon Sale Report'[Status]", 'Amazon Sale Report'[Status],
			"'Amazon Sale Report'[Sales Channel]", 'Amazon Sale Report'[Sales Channel],
			"SortBy_DM0_0", [SumAmount]
		)

	VAR __DS0PrimaryWithSortColumns = 
		NATURALLEFTOUTERJOIN(
			SUMMARIZE(
				__DS0Core,
				'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B],
				'Amazon Sale Report'[currency],
				'Amazon Sale Report'[Date],
				'Amazon Sale Report'[Fulfilment],
				'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-country],
				'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-service-level],
				'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-state],
				'Amazon Sale Report'[Size],
				'Amazon Sale Report'[Status],
				'Amazon Sale Report'[Sales Channel]
			),
			__DS0CoreTableByDM0
		)

	VAR __DS0PrimaryWindowed = 
		TOPN(
			201,
			__DS0PrimaryWithSortColumns,
			[SortBy_DM0_0],
			0,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B],
			1,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[currency],
			1,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Date],
			1,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Fulfilment],
			1,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-country],
			1,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-service-level],
			1,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-state],
			1,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Size],
			1,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Status],
			1,
			'Amazon Sale Report'[Sales Channel],
			1
		)

	VAR __DS0SecondaryBase = 
		SUMMARIZE(__DS0CoreOnlyOutputTotals, 'Amazon Sale Report'[Category])

	VAR __DS0Secondary = 
		TOPN(62, __DS0SecondaryBase, 'Amazon Sale Report'[Category], 1)

	VAR __DS0BodyLimited = 
		NATURALLEFTOUTERJOIN(
			__DS0PrimaryWindowed,
			SUBSTITUTEWITHINDEX(
				__DS0CoreOnlyOutputTotals,
				"ColumnIndex",
				__DS0Secondary,
				'Amazon Sale Report'[Category],
				ASC
			)
		)

EVALUATE
	__DS0Secondary

ORDER BY
	'Amazon Sale Report'[Category]

EVALUATE
	__DS0BodyLimited

ORDER BY
	[SortBy_DM0_0] DESC,
	'Amazon Sale Report'[B2B],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[currency],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[Date],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[Fulfilment],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-country],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-service-level],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[ship-state],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[Size],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[Status],
	'Amazon Sale Report'[Sales Channel],
	[ColumnIndex]
